name.baseName: Hydrocracking unit ; Hydrocracked gasoline, diesel, kerosene ; Hydrocracking ; All sizes; NESPS2
加氢裂化装置 ; 加氢裂化汽油、柴油、煤油 ; 减压渣油、重油馏分(减压蜡油、焦化蜡油、裂化循环油、脱沥青油等） ; 加氢裂化 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical treatment + biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical treatment + biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95
technology.technologicalApplicability: 加氢裂化装置处理各种石油馏分，如汽油、柴油、煤油、常压渣油和重油馏分（包括减压气油、焦化气油、催化循环油和脱沥青油），使用氢气裂解这些碳氢化合物。该装置适用于炼油行业的所有规模。末端管理技术确保了对生成废水的高效处理，高效去除化学需氧量、氨氮、有机结合氮、石油相关废物、酚和氰化物等污染物，对该行业的环境污染控制至关重要。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码25,四级代码2511文件，在完整版文件中第4090页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution cyanideisPhysical treatment + biological treatment + physicochemical treatment (or physical treatment, chemical treatment)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management88
污染物指标氰化物的末端治理技术是物理处理法+生物处理法+物理化学处理法（或物理处理法、化学处理法），其效率为88，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间/正常生产时间。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氰化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氰化物
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution cyanideisPhysical treatment + biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management79
污染物指标氰化物的末端治理技术是物理处理法+生物处理法，其效率为79，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间/正常生产时间。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氰化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氰化物
